meanings.sent1: She outdebates her classmates with strong arguments.
meanings.sent2: He always outdebates his opponents with logical reasoning.
meanings.sent3: The cat outdebates the dog on who gets the sunny spot by the window.
meanings.sent4: Her determination outdebates any obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The champion outdebates all challengers with ease.

meanings.sent1: The experienced debater outdebates the newcomers effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: He outdebates his peers with his quick wit and knowledge.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel outdebates the birds in finding the best nuts.
meanings.sent4: Her charisma outdebates any lack of preparation.
meanings.sent5: The coach outdebates the players in strategy and tactics.
